definition: to fight or argue on a blogging site (netspeak)
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: The brave policeman is fighting hand to hand with the ruffian.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的警察正在与那个歹徒博斗。

sentences.english: All through his life he believed that fighting and killing in wars was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他终生认为，战争中的博斗和杀戳是错误的。

sentences.english: Two Japanese were killed in the fight.
sentences.chinese: 两个日本人在这次博斗中丧生。

sentences.english: The brave man fought the wolves, a stick his only weapon.
sentences.chinese: 那勇士与狼群博斗，木棍是他的惟一武器。

definition: to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
to fight with all one has
lit. short-weaponed soldiery fight one another (idiom); fierce hand-to-hand infantry combat/to fight at close quarters
to fight together/to come to blows
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
to fight at close quarters/to tussle
to grapple (with the enemy)/to fight at the risk of one's life
